export.name: The Mark of Rites
export.description:
A magical tattoo that lets the person perform the ${"content":"Rites of Curell","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

You know what the Mark of Rites looks like and can identify it on a person if you get a good look.

export.name: Quest: Crates in Lake Ricrire
export.description: ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ has made mention of a set of crates at the bottom on ${"content":"Lake Ricrire","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on the continent of ${"content":"Lurus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that he says would be worthy of the favor he provided for you.

export.name: Quest: Favor for Ilerar
export.description:
In exchange for the locke of hair from ${"content":"Inrena Sollace","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, a favor is owed.

It is possible to buyout this favor for ${"content":"20,000","class":"rs-orange"}$G and ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ has mentioned that he will try to respect their alignment but gives no guarantees.

export.name: Travels: Learning the Rites
export.description:
Taking the morning to explore and prepare, the group split up in search of activities.

${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ preparing his disquise to pass as ${"content":"Somuli","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

${"content":"Lucy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ entertaining themselves in the town center.

${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Zachariah","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ venturing to the bar.

While the ladies had "issues" in the town center and returned, the bar trip was cut short when the black tiefling from the housoe was spotted. Attempting to follow him around led to the ${"content":"Temple of Zeus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ where ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ talked to him. ${"content":"Ordien","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ informed ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that he was looking for him and happy to see that he's still in town and hopes to catch him soon before vanishing. A quick search didn't reveal if ${"content":"Ordien","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was still around or not but he seemed to be completely gone.

Everyone returning to the room at the same time, chaos ensued as ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ struggled to deal with a bad trip while on ${"content":"Reefer Blend","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Soon after they prepared to sleep and meet ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ the next day.

The next day the group went forth to meet ${"content":"Ilerar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and in doing so secured a ${"content":"Locke of Inera Sollace's Hair","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in exchange for 1 favor in the future. That favor may be whatever he needs at the time but he seemed sincere in trying to keep from asking something they would not like.

On their way out, ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ made a quick stop in the library, posing as ${"content":"Somuli","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with his disuise and managed to learn of ${"content":"The Rites of Curell","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the "writing" process and the tattoo accompanying it. And while distinct, it can be easily covered. And while others can be granted the Rite, it takes 8 people with the Rite to grant it, seemingly why ${"content":"Curell","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ has 9 ${"content":"Meisters","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Finishing with their day, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ sought to find resolution with the occupants of the ${"content":"Arcanouos Erdous","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ house and after wondering around for a moment found the ${"content":"Red Tiefling","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ at the door and discovered her swallowing a blue bean. Unable to react to her in time, he felt his mind slip to the ${"content":"Hilt of the Blade of The Mist","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in his bag. Gaining some control, he managed to obscure some of his thoughts before casting ${"content":"Spirit Guardians","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to defend himself.

Skirmishing in the streets briefly, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ found himself a small pincushion for her arrows but did manage to drive her back into the protection of the building. Discovering that he could not heal himself, he retreated to the bar where ${"content":"Immel","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"N'Orel","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ took care of him, showering him in a keg of blessed brew, restoring the ability for him to be healed.

Meeting up with ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in the bar as well, they discovered that ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was additionally cursed. ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to dispell the curse but discovered too late that dispelling it triggered it, but in ddispelling it, triggered it before it reached its full charge, dealing ${5d10,orange}$ ${"content":"Necrotic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ damage and discovering its full potential to be ${10d10,orange}$ ${"content":"Necrotic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ damage.

Then taking a much needed rest as the rest of the group arrived at the bar, taking their

export.name: Travels: The Search Begins
export.description:
With the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ badly damaged, the party set out into the continent of ${"content":"Druteta","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in search of viable wood for repairs. Their landing spot just a few dozen yards from the North Western shore seemed enough to keep the spiders away but the northern forest's infestation made it less than ideal for harvesting for lumber. Reviewing the maps with ${"content":"Anna","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the South Eastern side of the island seemed a good place to get wood.

After careful consideration, they decided on taking both row boats along the northern shore to head to the forest. Forced to stay near the coast due to the rough seas, they had several fights with sharks and a close encounter with a ${"content":"Blue Crystal Spider","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ after trying to capture it. They learned that the crystaline spiders are quite deadly and that ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ can capture elemental vials of energy from their paniced attacks under some cicumstances.

Continuing down the shore, they managed to keep their boats afloat through several shark fights, despite taking a fair amount of damage. After some traveling they managed to find a small stop to pull into along the shore with a stone staircase up to the top of the sheer cliff. And along the top they found a destroyed mining town and an abandoned carriage.

Venturing to the carriage, they discovered it was badly damaged and seemed like it happened about a month ago. Looking around they found some crystals but also a blue crystal spider seemingly packed in with the crystals. Meanwhile ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ found several more non-crystal spiders inside the carriage. Killing those off, they managed to find 3 ${"content":"Blue Power Crystals","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, a few ${"content":"Pickaxes","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and the large war axe ${"content":"Inertia","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Looking it over, they found it too damaged for an easy repair but salvaged some of the wood to help repair the boats.

Going to the mining town, they did some exploring but the town seemed old and desolate. The weather had worn down most of what was left and the rest seemed looted. But some investigating found a couple axes, some more pickaxes, and a small hand cart they could use to carry items around.

Heading back to the boats, they packed everything in and got ready to continue down the shore to the South Eastern forests...

export.name: Temple of Whaitiri on Druteta
export.description: You've learned of a temple to the ${"content":"Merfolkian","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ god ${"content":"Whaitiri","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

export.name: Blessed Knowledge of the Storms
export.description:
Having freed the ${"content":"Whaitiri","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s temple from the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, she offered you the collected knowledge of the storms that they sought to aid you in protecting the world.

Having survived acquiring the knowledge, you may choose one of the 6 ${"content":"Feats","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ within the knowledge to aid you:
+ ${"content":"Storm Ravager","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Storm's Fortitude","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Storm's Grace","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Storm's Knowledge","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Storm's Light","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Storm's Thunder","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

And while many things have come forth from the knowledge to aid you, you can also feel the vast expanse of knowledge now inside your mind and you know there is more to discover.

Once per session you may make a skill check to attempt to further understand the knowledge within you. This skill check can not critically succeed or fail and may be any of the following, each with their own path in your mind:
+ ${"content":"Animal Handling","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Arcana","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"History","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Investigation","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Religion","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Survival","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
export.note:
Animal Handling
+ Improved Familiar
+ Commune with Nature

Arcana
+ Work towards sorcery points
+ Learn to cast basic level 1 spells

History
+ Pieces of lore

Investigation
+ Pieces of different lore
+ Investigation or Perception bonus
+ Bonus to profession skill

Religion
+ Improved divination spells
+ Some form of tracking
+ An enchantment

Survival
+ Spells for tents or hiding
+ Improved stealth or tracking skills

export.name: Travels: Meeting the Arcane Society
export.description:
Resting for the night with ${"content":"Okubi","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ safely in the bag of holding the group expected a nice nights sleep but again had nightmares, waking up just barely rested enoough for their planned exit from the city. Looking at the map and planning their leave, they found a small bay along the northen coast away from the ${"content":"Northern Wolf Territory","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and contacted ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to make plans for meeting up.

Heading down for breakfast, they found the delicious smell of bacon and guards patrolling the streets. Sneaking out into their midsts, ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to make out that they were looking for an ${"content":"Oldman with a long beard and a icy mist around him","class":"rs-darkred"}$ and that they were looking for him due to his street fight earlier. He also over heard that the occupants of the house, while believed to be the victims, were refusing to aid in the investigation from the city guard.

Knowing this, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ went back to the room, shaved his beard, and took off ${"content":"Icy Pressence","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and with him looking more like a flagrant bard than a skilled cleric, they easily avoided the guards of the city. However, others seemed to be stalking them and with some key maneuvering, managed to slip out of the city gates and get into the open wilds.

Reaching their planned meeting spot, they waited for ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, knowing that he has several days of sea travel before reaching them. Looking around, they found a small cave and on investigating found several small gems and 4 weasels sleeping in the back. In her usual fashion,  ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ sought to talk to them and managed to befriend a pair of the weasels, the rest scurrying off back into the forest. The remaining days along the coast passed uneventfully, their eyes on the look out for their lost tail possibly finding them.

Picking everyone up, the boat sulked slowly back out to the safty of the sea as they decided their next destination. ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ again seeking guidance from ${"content":"Dionysus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to which he received a riddle;

```
If it is greed you seek
Then North you should make
To reach the end,
East you should lay
```

Discussing among themselves, they decided on north, to the city of ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, where the ${"content":"Arcane Society","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is based and the famed blacksmith ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is based.

On their way, ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ contacted ${"content":"Beren Linja","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to ask about the society. And while she did not learn much, she discovered that the ${"content":"Linjas","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ are currently on the island of ${"content":"Druteta","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and that the society shouold be fairly open to visitors. Though it took a few attempts to learn this information.

Reaching ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the ${"content":"Ntanti","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ docked and they set off into the town, heading first for the society's headquarters to investigate. While there, they learned about ${"content":"Via Lantent","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and that she is present but selective about seeing people. They also discovered that while the society is open to visitors, the library is limited only to members, and that your "rank" in the society controls the access you have. Specifically at this point, ${"content":"Alcolytes","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ have access only to information pertinent to their direct research. Additionally, joining costs ${"content":"1000","class":"rs-yellow"}$G and your arcane signature is detailed and saved to identify you, but also allows clear scrying on your person.

Inquiring further with the person at the welcoming desk, they left their ${"content":"Divine Blue Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to be delivered to ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to hopefully pique her interests. The person at the desk agreed to pass along their request and that they should come back the next day for the results of the persuassion, on ${"content":"Vaknaevum 19","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

With that information in hand, the group separated to look into different things. ${"content":"Edith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ exploring the idea of joining the society. As she did not have a specific thought in mind, ${"content":"Penea","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ recommended that she take up investigate the ${"content":"Great Wyrms","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ as there is little information on the beans the wyrms produce and there is a growing demand for the beans in research happening in the society as their previous supplier is no longer able to assist them. And after pondering for sometime, ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ agreed and received her alcolyte information.

As ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ looked into joining the society, ${"content":"Lucy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ set off to find someone to help her with her bracer problem, the others in tow for possible fun enchantments and items. Talking to the person at the desk, they were directed to ${"content":"Surfagi Ithi","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, known for his expertise and experience with enchantments and curses, but also for his short temper. On reaching his lab, the group found a very angry gnome yelling and ordering his assistants around. One helpful assitant recommending that they come back later when their boss is more calm, possibly tomorrow.

Meeting back up, they set off to the Inn. Seemingly run by dwarves, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ found the beverage selection lacking and learned that the local ${"content":"Brothel","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was maintained by a cleric of ${"content":"Dionysus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and thay it thusly had a lovely selection.

Quickly venturing out, they encountered a blackscaled dragonborn mannning the bar and drank while they observed and waited for the cleric to arrive. While waiting, they met one ${"content":"Jenkins Hicrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ buying him a drink as they sat and talked. Later learning that ${"content":"Jenkins","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is self-described friends with ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ after hearing about their desire to meet her. Their conversation ending with ${"content":"Jenkins","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ setting off to meet an arriving dancer as the brithel seemed to pick up more action. Their meeting of the cleric was brief in that time, simply getting his name, ${"content":"Ukuma","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and some delicious beverages that he had available.

Calling it a night from there, the group sought lodging for the night and found the Inn a bit expensive, but ${"content":"Lucy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ decided to splurge for a night on land instead of at sea. Everyone else settling for a night's rest on the boat. Everyone excited for another night without nightmares and their meeting with Via tomorrow...

export.name: Cave to Athena in Tebit
export.description:
You know of the location of a cave dedicated to the goddess ${"content":"Athena","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in the ${"content":"Antic Forest","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on the island of ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

After answering three riddles for the goddess, she lifted the doors and revealed 3 pedestools, 2 of which had ancient holy symbols and one of which appeared empty with some threads of clothing left behind.

export.name: Origins of the Kintari
export.description: Originally created by the first great wizard as servents to help bring about the apocolypse, these creatures are created from Merfolk and their corruption is through knowledge the wizard gained from ${"content":"Whaitiri","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

export.name: Travels: The Temple to Whaitiri
export.description:
Venturing into the forest, ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ felt a pressence deep in the forest, drawing them deeper into the forest. As they approached, a storm, seemingly always there but somehow not visible before, swirled above, seemingly centered on whatever was calling to ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Cautiously working their way through the dense trees and rain, they found a cave and an odd clearing of grass. Investigating the area, the grass appeared normal other than the odd circular-ness and openness of the field. The cave appeared a normal cave aside from a symbol, , of which ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ made particular note. But with a seemingly friendly call pulling at ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s senses, the group descended into the cave. While dark, a light seemed to flicker once they were deeper in the cave. Calling out to what they expected to be a friendly pressence quickly turned out to be ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ seemingly patrolling the area. Quickly dispatching the pests, the group suffered minimal injuries before continuing further into the cave. Reaching the end, they found a bowl with a blue glowing bubble around it, seemingly at the end of the cave. Familiar with blue glowing fields, they toyed with placing a blue power crystal into it and eventually left the crystal inside the field, watching a secret door as the crystal dissolved inside the field. Rushing through the door before it closed, they all made it inside, the door closing right behind them. The area before them seemingly a place of worship, ancient pews lay before them along with tattered bookshelves and destroyed books. Looking around they found a few things in near by rooms, but nothing of seeming significance before wandering into what appeared to be the main room, opting for the source of the call before exploring a near by locked room. The main hall was overgrown with grass and ruined rocks, a few noting that grass seemed odd down here with no light to feed it until they noticed a large circular ceiling that they suspected aligned with the odd clearing above and an odd connection with the vegetative life in the room. It wasn't long after entering the hall however that they heard a voice call to them faintly, asking them to accept a gift if they can survive. A small glowing ball slowly manifesting in the middle of the hall under the center of the odd circle. Hesitant, but determined, they all placed a hand on the glowing orb to accept the would be gift, the odd circle above clearing as the storm ravaged above, culminating in a large bolt of lightning striking them all. While many fell unconscious, those that managed to continue standing nursed their battered ears as they revived and supported one another, slowly resting to regain their sense of balance. Looking around, the storm above had cleared to mere clouds, the orb was gone, and the ceiling gave no signs of resealing. The main change seemed to be a collective pounding headache and new found knowledge about the world swirling in their heads. The name ${"content":"Whaitiri","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and her ${"content":"Blessed Knowledge of the Storms","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ seemingly important. And after some time recovering, they all collective found a message somehow embedded in their new knowledge.

Friends, our time is short as my connection with all of you seems to be weak. The knowledge now in your heads is a blessed collection from my followers who once worshiped me here. I hope I am not wrong in entrusting this information with you, but I certainly can not let it fall to the Kintari who are here in search of how to obtain it themselves.

Hopefully this anthology serves you well and may your Travels flow true.

Taking their time, they all searched their minds, exploring the depths of their new found experiences and found themselves closer to understanding much more regarding the existence and nature of the world. Their self discovery however was cut short. A sharp sense of invasion in their minds as their connection with the temple sharpened. Everyone keenly aware of Kintari entering the temple and heading towards them. Examining their situation, they were aware the fight would be hard, the first wave of Kintari reaching the door as they decided to attempt to flee through the open roof. As ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ attempted to hold the door, the rest of the group worked on determining how to best escape, getting grappling hooks ready as ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ prepared to use ${"content":"Rope Trick","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. However, the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ pressing the attack were much stronger than those they had encountered on ${"content":"Sulendirida","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and managed to destroy one other doors, allowing a few to rush into the room. The ensuing fight proved nearly fatal. The warriors attacking proving hearty and deadly as ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ found themselves under duress. Defending themselves, they felt their connection with the temple itself try to aid them, several small rocks shaking loose in the heat of the battle, however they didn't seem to have a strong enough connection to aid more than that. Meanwhile, the less durable of the group quickly scurried out, the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ warriors threatening to overwhelm them in their situation. ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ attempted to hold the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ at bay while the others scurred to the surface, but ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ suffered several substantial wounds as they made their last moves to escape. Out from the cave, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ collapsed the doorway with ${"content":"Erupting","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ earth to cut off the other ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that were coming their way and the group managed to kill the remaining warriors that climbed the sides of the walls. ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ using a momentary reprieve to retrieve his grappling hook before the group took off back towards their rowboats. Having had a long night rowing their boats, another long night running through the forest had started to prove exhausting, but the group managed to climb into the trees and get a long rest in the safety of their branches under the disapproving glare of a near by ${"content":"Sloth","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Ignoring the slow, judgmental creature, the group left in the morning back towards their boats, finding them intact and seemingly no ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ around. Leaving the group to quickly figure out how to haul lumber back to the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ before they are found....

export.name: Blessed Knowledge: Improved Attack
export.description:
Having searched investigation as a rogue, you've gained improved knowledge of how to attack another creature.

You've got more searching to perform before the knowledge becomes wisdom, but you know that if you continue to search investigation at least, you will learn the ${"content":"Improved Critical","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ feat.

export.name: Blessed Knowledge: Improved Familiar
export.description:
Having searched ${Arcana,orange}$ as a wizard, you've gained improved knowledge on how to summon your familiar.

You've got more searching to perform before the knowledge becomes wisdom, but you know that if you continue to search ${Arcana,orange}$ or ${"content":"Animal Handling","class":"rs-orange"}$ at least, you will learn the ${"content":"Improved Familiar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ feat.

export.name: Blessed Knowledge: Divine Attunement
export.description:
Having searched ${Religion,orange}$ as a cleric, you've gained knowledge on how on how to better handle your ${"content":"Holy Symbol","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

You've got more searching to perform before the knowledge becomes wisdom, but you know that if you continue to search ${Religion,orange}$ at least, you will learn the ${"content":"Divine Attunement","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ feat.

export.name: Blessed Knowledge: Step Softly
export.description:
Having searched ${Survival,orange}$ as a Barbarian, you've gained knowledge on how on how to move more quietly.

You've got more searching to perform before the knowledge becomes wisdom, but you know that if you continue to search ${Survival,orange}$ at least, you will learn the ${"content":"Step Softly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ feat.

export.name: Symbols of the Gods
export.description: From the blessed knowledge you received, you've learned of the symbols of the gods, though you know not all of the, The Common Gods + Athena + Cthulhu + Daminoth + Dionysus + Lucian + Serinal + Zeus The Old and Forgotten Gods + Whaitiri + + + + The Ancient Ones + + Durong +

export.name: Quest: Collapsed Temples and Holy Relics
export.description:
Via has informed you of 3 suspected holy sites that ma have lost holy symbols in them, but that each may have its own issues for retrieving them, if there are any holy symbols at all.

One of which is deep in the ${"content":"Antic Forest","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the others are in the northern mountains of ${"content":"Mikillabellera","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

export.name: Travels: Metallic Scorpions of Druteta
export.description:
Looking at the trees and preparing a plan for moving them, ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ suggested felling them all at once and ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ had the idea to use ${"content":"Feather Fall","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on them as they fell. Prepping them before hand, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ suggested delimbing the trees before felling them. ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
taking to prepparing the trees as the rest crawled through the trees removing limbs. While in the trees, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ noticed the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in the area seemingly searching for them, but with their plan to quietly get the wood, they managed to get the trees down and chopped up with none of them noticing.

Getting the wood to the boat, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ took turns floating the wood on ${"content":"Floating Disks","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. On their way, they found themselves under fire from ${"content":"Kintarian Ballista","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on the cliff side. With the range, the shots were weak and inaccurate but a few managed to hit ${"content":"Norwind's Folly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and the ${"content":"Summit of the Sea","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Examining the situation, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ used ${"content":"Major Image","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to attempt to cover the boat, managing to throw one of the ballistas off but not the other.

As the ballista bolts continued to fall around the boats, ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ concentrated and cast ${"content":"Call Lightning","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, managing to destroy the confused ballista that was slowly managing to see through ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s illusion. As the fry continued, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ used ${"content":"Fly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to get closer and used ${"content":"Eru[ting Earth","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to clear the remaining ballista.

Further down the coast, they soon found the task of keeping the disks up exhausting over the long journey. Remembering the cave on the side of the cliffs, they opted to head there, and once inside managed to pull the boats up, repair them with some of the extra wood and managed a long rest.

Though, while the others slept, ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ heard spiders further down the cave and woke ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ for some support. The pair killed a dozen spiders, sending the rest retreating back into the cave. ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ returning to his trance once they got back.

When they woke, they headed to the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and found that ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Vo","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ had killed a ${"content":"Giant Spider","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, its corpse floating near the boat as they climbed aboard. With the wood secured, they set about repairing the boat and the rowboats and got everything in decent repair.

Now that the boat was seaworthy again, they decided to go back to the cliff side cave to investigate and use the brief respite to look over things and relax. ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ using the time to further her research with the ${"content":"Power Crystals","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and everyone meditating on the new wealth of knowledge in their heads.

Reaching the cave, they used a rowboat to get over, ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ pulling the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ out into the deeper waters where the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ would hopefully have trouble seeing it.

Once in the cave, they ventured back and found a fork in the tunnels. Opting for their left, they found ${"content":"Metallic Scorpions","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ crawling around, mostly ignoring them, but also seemingly a difficult fight should one occur. The further back they went, the more they found, eventually finding a large, deep cavern crawling with them. However, in the darkness, several glows sotod out where ${"content":"Power Crystals","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ had become exposed.

Searching around with ${"content":"Fly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they found several exposed, as though the scorpions where digging them out. ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managing to slip one out from under a few and catching a glimpse of a little over 2 dozen in the back, including Orange and Lime ones. He also observed one of the crystals being eaten by one of the scorpions, giving a bit of a rush to his thoughts of getting the crystals, something the group agreed was worth trying to get once he returned with the crystal he had grabbed.

Working out another plan involving water and ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ using ${"content":"Control Water","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they had ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$  and ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ enveloped in a water bubble as ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ carried them over the metallic insects below. The seeming wall of scorpions posing a problem to their stealth flight toward the back.

Setting the pair of rogues down on a near by ${"content":"Orange Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the nest seemed to come alive with activity as the scorpions struggled to free from the ball of water that ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ hollowed out to let them mine faster. Keeping their eyes peeled, they watched as the giant scorpions in the back scooped up the crystals in the back and carried them to safty in the back, the nest seemingly alert and concerned.

Being quick, the rogues dug up the orange crystal and managed to unearth another orange one near by, managing to tgrab it as well before needing to flee. ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ using the remains of the fly spell cast on him to carry ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ as the hollow ball of water began to fill with confused scorpions who were left trying to understand the water from which they had fled.

With the nest behind them and seemingly chasing them, they ran to the cave, and with the short time that had passed, they managed to fly the boat down and carry everyone down and set off back toward the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ under the cover of night.

As they kept watch, they saw several torches around the cliff seemingly looking around for something. Likely the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ but they knew not for sure...

export.name: Illusion Research: Effects of Crystals
export.description:
# ${"content":"318 Comiaevum 21","class":"rs-lightblue"}$ <sub>${"content":"Session 33","class":"rs-darkorange"}$</sub>

Taking time on the Sorafin to observe the crystals on hand, you've managed to use the Red, Green, and Blue crystals to some avail in a non-combat setting:
+ ${Red,red}$: Unknown, magic seemed to cast normally but no distinct effect casting around the boat
+ ${Blue,blue}$: Illusions seem larger, better control over them
+ ${Green,green}$: Illusions seem to be able to take on some practical effects making semi-real rain and storms in small spells
+ ${Orange,orange}$: Illusions seem to gain some kind of solidity

No ${Lime,lime}$ crystals were available. ${Silver,silver}$ and ${Gold,gold}$ will likely take some time to find.

Casting through a crystal may cause the crystal to shatter. When performed, roll 1d6 and on a ${5,orange}$ or a ${6,orange}$, the crystal used shatters to dust.
export.note:
Orla's Research:

+ **Red** : Combative, higher DC, not successful yet (Only done out of combat)
+ **Blue** : Control, bigger or further out
+ **Green** : Natural, can make semi usable food or storms
+ **Orange** : Things become interactable to a degree
+ **Lime** : Can manifest large real images depending on rolls
+ **Silver** : Shielded while channeling magic (Consumes 1/5 the crystal)
+ **Gold** : Magic doesn't use a spell slot (Consumes 1/3 crystal)


This is for the arcane society.

export.name: Nautical Navigation
export.description:
You've learned to navigate the open seas from ${"content":"Anna","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, allowing you to plot a course to a location with some anticipation of weather and other possible obstacles.

Additionally, with a view of the stars or notably land features and the sun, you have a chance at ascertaining where a location might be.

export.name: Ancient Accuio Aquarium in Vatnunda
export.description:
On the small island in northern ${"content":"Vatnunda","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, there is an underground ancient research area that served as an aquarium. Here it seems the ancients researched the optics of underwater vision and the effects of water and evolution, using it to hone arcane magics and enchantments.

Last it was known, the ring ${"content":"Visius","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was stored here, one of their greater achievements in enchanting and vision. Other artifacts may still be stored here as the lab has robust security around it, but you think you may know the combination...

export.name: Blessed Knowledge: Huntress
export.description: Searching the knowledge in your mind, you've discovered how to pursue your enemies more carefully.

export.name: Improved Familiar Form: Psuedodragon
export.description: You've learned to bring your familiar into this realm as a Pseudodragon with the ${"content":"Improved Familiar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ feat.

export.description:

export.name: Ancient Black Dragon: Tindium
export.description:
A great black dragon from ancient times, he was lured into a slumber in the northern part of what is now ${Mikillabellera,orange}$ and caged there in a magical stasis lock.

His prison being disturbed allowed the essence of his nature to leak out, causing the ${Acid,orange}$ rains in the North.

export.name: Fugitive from the Arcane Society
export.description:
On the${"content":"12","class":"rs-orange"}$<sup>th</sup> of ${"content":"Dormevum","class":"rs-orange"}$ in ${"content":"317","class":"rs-orange"}$, a researcher from the ${"content":"Arcane Society","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ by the name of ${"content":"Sinda","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ fled the city of ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ after attempting to steal a ${"content":"Veldyr Statue","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ from a fellow researcher, ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

She is wanted in ${"content":"Leoterra","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Draconia","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with a ${15000 ,orange}$G reward for her capture, dead or alive. However, you suspect you can get ${15000 + 1000*cha,orange}$G.

export.name: Ancient Arcane Wizard Prison
export.description: You've learned of a place where a wizard was once held for crimes in the ancient world.
export.note: This is the prison that once held Vox for his crimes against the Ancient Black Dragon Tindium and generally attempting to take over the world through chaos and deception.

export.name: Travels: Collapsed Temples and Holy Relics
export.description:
Waking in the inn, the group pondered where to go and discussed the ${"content":"Fugitive Sinda","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ they had heard about yesterday. Opting for some shopping before meeting ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ ordering a ${"content":"Simple Bag of Holding","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ from ${"content":"Animous Maevion","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ a ${"content":"Flute","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ from the same. ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ tipping ${100,orange}$% for special care. Both items noted to be ready in a few days by the shop keep.

Searching around for his usual curiosities, the group followed ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to visit ${"content":"Sylvon","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the researcher in charge of handling the city's dead. Unfortunately there were no dead to spare when they visited, but ${"content":"Sylvon","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ didn't seem against the idea of giving ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ any of their dead and mentioned a few places to find animals around. She even chuckled at his question regarding the homeless in the area.

Meeting ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ after shopping, the group managed to find their way in, learning how to reach her smithery for future requests. Staying in her forge, she asked a favor in return for her services; She is in need of a ${"content":"Holy Relic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to fulfil a request for a client. To that end, she disclosed the location of 3 suspected ancient temples, likely collapsed, where a relic might be found. One of which is on the island of ${"content":"Tebit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the other 2 are in Northern ${"content":"Mikillabellera","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Heading out to search for the temples, the group ran across a small group of ${"content":"Panthers","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Getting into a skirmish with the panthers, ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ quickly managed to calm them with ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s chunks of meat. The animals seeming calm enough to leave the group alone but not being terribly cooperative, but thinking back later, the panthers seemed to be ${"content":"Dreagiddo Panthers","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, deadly mutations of the usual panther.

Following the trail that ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ coaxed from their furry not-friends, they slowly reached a cave that seemed to fit the cave for which they were searching. Heading down, they found a large open room with 3 coordiors heading off in different directions. ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ took to exploring them and found himself uneasy in 2 of them. After some investigating, ${"content":"!uincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to remove ${"content":"Concecrated Ground","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that seemed to be of an evil alignment, causing the tremors that ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was experiencing and he found himself much calmer.

Knowing that the cave seemed to be to ${"content":"Athena","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Quincy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ sought to commune with her, everyone finding her voice in their thoughts as she gave them 3 riddles to answer. As they replied, they learned that while some had many answers, the ones she sought were the ones that those of an oath would give, but she found them worthy enough to bestow them with the blessed relics in her cave. They found holy relics of ${"content":"Athena","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Dionysus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, but the third pedestal laid bare on searching through the misted cloud. Looking around, they found ${"content":"Loose Threads","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ near the where the relic should have been and saved them for possible searching later.

Leaving the cave, they discussed checking the other caves for possible other relics or calling it a night for now and returning to ${"content":"Via","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s, and decided to seach the other locations they were given. Opting to skip the docks, they headed to the seaside cliffs and climbed into the mountains in search of one of the caves. ${"content":"Lucy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Zachariah","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ stayed with ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and the others watching over the ${"content":"Ntanti","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

In the mountains, the group ran into a Leoterran patrol and in talking with the soldiers, the group managed to convince them that they were on an expedition for the ${"content":"Arcane Society","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and were told they'd need to register with the general in ${"content":"Cotens","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. The trek took a few days back and forth, but they were registered and officially on a "sanctioned" expedition, complete with a regiment to protect them while they explore the caves, the same regiment who brought them in to register.

When they get to the area where the cave should be, ${"content":"Baydel Sajie","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the captain of the guard, notes that the area is prone to ${"content":"Acid Rains","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and that was why there were some 80 caves in the area, but most were only 10 to 20 meters deep and easily checked. Investigating the area, the group found 5 candidates, 1 semi-questionable cave and 4 that seemed to have real depth to explore.

Delving into the questionable cave first, they quickly found a dead end and dilligently searching around after dealing with a number of illusary blockages, they stumbled upon a switch, which ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ quickly activated, dispensing everyone a few hundred studs down into a large squarish room. A last minute ${"content":"Fly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ spell greatly reducing the pain of the landing.

Composing themselves, getting out seemed troublesome, but ambient noise, like groaning or rumbling lead them to explore the 3 cave like exits from the room, leaning towards the one that seemed somewhat constructed. Alternating casts of ${"content":"Detect Magic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Ash","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Eldith","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ were drawn to multiple instances of ${"content":"Necromantic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ magic seemingly wandering about in the walls of the cave as they explored.

Finding a deadend, they noted a skeleton and 2 chests. Weary of the magic they detected and of the noises in the cave, they hid in the deadend, waiting to see what came to pass, but found the skeleton slowly reanimating, bandages appearing from the aether as it quickly shifted into a ${"content":"Mummy","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Quietly casting ${"content":"Dispell Magic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the creature fell apart, but the whispering voices and groans grew louder in the cave, eventually subsiding again. Opting to avoid the chests due to the ${"content":"Enchantment","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ magic coming from them.

Deeper in the cave in another direction, they found a giant door that ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ recognized as an old style ${"content":"Dwarven Mine Entrance","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Peaking inside, they found several chests with ${"content":"Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$s inside and skeletons laying around on the ground. Using ${"content":"Mage Hand","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they found they couldn't dislodge the crystal. Slapping the chest, it seemed to come to life and devour the hand, seemingly, as expected, a ${"content":"Mimic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Engaging the awoken ${"content":"Mimic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the group maanged to kill it but found that other chests had moved in behind them. Securing their spot in the cave, they pondered how to slip out from the cave...

export.name: Arcane Crystal Research Note
export.description:
# ${"content":"318 Comiaevum 14","class":"rs-lightblue"}$ <sub>${"content":"Session 33","class":"rs-darkorange"}$</sub>

The colors of the arcane are diverse but not all crystals are needed; ${"content":"Red", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Blue", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Green", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ seem to serve as the most basic of components and our research has shown that we can create the ${"content":"Lime", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Orange", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ crystals from them but ${"content":"Silver", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ still eludes us.

We have some information on how to create a ${"content":"Gold", "class":"rs-darkorange"}$ crystal but have yet to test the proposed theory.

# ${"content":"318 Comiaevum 25","class":"rs-lightblue"}$ <sub>${"content":"Session 34","class":"rs-darkorange"}$</sub>

Further experimentation on the crystals yielded several results regarding the crystals:
+ Using them with effect seems to drain them, each crystal seeming to have somewhere between 3 and 7 uses before essentially disintigrating
+ Orange crystals give the illusions some form of mass but don't necessaryily match the expected texture
+ Red crystals improve the underlying strength of the spells, making them harder to identify as illusions (Improving your spell DC)

export.name: Crew Manifest of the Sorafin
export.description:
The boat used by the Draconian Discretionary Forces.

Hired Crew: ( ${450,orange}$G per Month )
+ Engram Angorum ${300,orange}$G
+ Voro Himmerlock ${50,orange}$G
+ Aranza Liniq ${50,orange}$G
+ Gloin Cayat ${50,orange}$G


Helmsman: ${"content":"Engram Angorum","class":"rs-darkorange"}$  
Chef: ${"content":"Gloin Cayat","class":"rs-darkorange"}$  
Deckhands:
+ ${"content":"Voro Himmerlock","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ ${"content":"Aranza Liniq","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

General Codes:
+ Communication Stones  
    + Codeword: "${"content":"Mandolin","class":"rs-orange"}$"
    + Storage: One end generally in the bow of the ship

export.name: Travels: Return to Arcar's Tomb
export.description:
Having repaired the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ the group considered traveling to ${"content":"Basel","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in search of the many abandoned mining sites that they know are present, but after some discussion they decided that heading back to ${"content":"Dranous","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ would be best.

On the way to ${"content":"Dranous","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the group spent some time refining their skills and knowledge, searching through the knowledge in their heads, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ waiting to reach the ${"content":"Imperial Library","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to possibly have more help in delving into the lost locations in his memory through which he he hoped to search. ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ spending some time with the ${"content":"Power Crystals","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and learning more about the ${"content":"Red","class":"rs-red"}$ and ${"content":"Orange","class":"rs-orange"}$ crystals. Most notably that while the crystals can help empower magic, after several uses they seem to fade and disintigrate.

Reaching ${"content":"Dranous","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ the group sought out ${"content":"Lar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to report in and get updates and notably learned that the Assassin had escaped from the city and is believed to be on the hunt for the pieces of ${"content":"The Artifact","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. To that end, ${"content":"Lar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ mentioned that the group should avoid her for now so as to protect the location of the pieces of the artifact. Additionally they learned that ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Vo","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Anna","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ were being retasked to help with the pursuit of the assassin but that the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ would be left in their care.

Additionally, the security in the room noticed that someone had a tracking spell on them and after some thinking ${"content":"Lar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ noted that ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ had a tracking enchantment on her and a Draconian Cleric removed it. ${"content":"Lar","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s theory being that she was enchanted while at ${"content":"The Arcane Society","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

To the end of continued use of the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and after a bit of a vote, ${"content":"Po","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ trained ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to captain a large sailboat so that he had the knowledge keep the boat in functioning order and ${"content":"Anna","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ trained ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ in deep sea navigation. And to help with running the boat they hired 2 soldiers from the ${"content":"Draconian Army","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, a dwarven fighter ${"content":"Voro Himmerlock","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and a half elf ranger ${"content":"Aranza Liniq","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. To round off the crew they set off toward the city of ${"content":"Montis","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on ${"content":"Mikilabellera","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ where they found a group of seasoned dwarven sailors drinking in ${"content":"The Moritorium","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. A bit of talking and they managed to hire ${"content":"Engram Angorum","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ who had experience with boat upkeep and navigation to serve as their helmsman.

Checking in with the Guild, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to get 5 contracts from the guild for the group to investigate; Two deliveries, two contracts to destroy pirate boats, and 1 contract to pirate an expedition boat. Each has some deadlines as none were available to be accepted exclusively. But the contract to pirate the ${"content":"Sibita","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ had a deadline too soon for the group to get to in time.

Updated and with a crew, they set out for ${"content":"Sulendirida","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to check on the ${"content":"Blade of Mist","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ where they found a large gathering of ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ patroling the area around the tomb's entrance where they hid the crown along with the fireball hurling ${"content":"Great Wyrm","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that they fled from after having hid the blade there.

Sneaking onto the cliffside and past several ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with the help of a ${"content":"Blue Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they found themselves with a few dozen kintarian obstacles that seemed to be investigating the tomb. With ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ needing a long rest to recover her spells and a patrol near-by, ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ tasks ${"content":"Hivern","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with distracting the patrol and after a long wait, and the help of ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, manages to fish the injured kitty from the water below, several spears stuck into her side as she reverted to her status form and rested in ${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s inventory.

With ${"content":"Hivern","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ back, the patrol returned in search of the beast, with enough time bought for ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to wake and help kill the patrol before they could get off a signal. The sun rising and 4 of the some 3 dozen kintari in the area dead, the rest of the group awoke and prepared to make a plan...

export.name: Alchemy: Obscurance Bomb
export.description:
You know how to create a ${"content":"Obscurance Bomb","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. 

Takes the below with an ${"content":"Alchemy Kit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ at DC${15,orange}$ skill check:
+ 1 ${"content":"Flask","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ 1 ${"content":"Umusi Leaf","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ 4 ${"content":"Alchemy Ingredient Bundle","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

export.name: Travels: Ancient Storage Vault of Mikillabellera
export.description:
Deep in the cave, the group managed to fight their way forward, further down the ${"content":"Mine","class":"rs-orange"}$. Just a bit further down, they found a kind of office in on off branch of the ${"content":"Mine","class":"rs-orange"}$ with several chests, a desk, and a cabinet; Of which the desk and a chest were ${"content":"Mimics","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, but the others contained several items and an old but preserved note for someone to set up protections for the area.

Cautiously dealing with the contents of the office after a quick attempt at pressing a button on the desk revealed it to be a more clever ${"content":"Mimic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they found several items including a set of ${"content":"Unknown Bracers","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and a ${"content":"Potion of Dissolution","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ that they couldn't quite make out. Further down the ${"content":"Mine","class":"rs-orange"}$ seemed to have caved in for an unknown reason, but it seemed that some digging had been done to enter or leave some parts of the ${"content":"Mine","class":"rs-orange"}$ where it had caved in.

Hurting from the fights, they took a short rest and healed up a bit in the protection of the office. Most notably from their rest were the sounds of the ${"content":"Ghosts","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ this deep in the ${"content":"Mine","class":"rs-orange"}$, having declined. But as they sat in the office, they noticed a faint irregular knocking or dispersing sound from the walls that appeared to be solidly in the rock sides. And while certain there was nothing behind the walls, ${"content":"Ginnet","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is still convinced there is something behind the walls.

Returning toward the center, the sounds returned and they ventured east, slowly finding another dead end with a coat that matched the loose fibers they found in the ${"content":"Athenian Cave","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. But strangely no creatures as with the Western cave.

The last branch heading North had portions caved in as well but seemed to shift and somehow settle on a more pristine spherical room protected by a ${"content":"Purple Field","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ similar to the crystal powered openings they had come across in the past.

Passing into he room, they were confronted with 3 panels, 2 requesting input of some kind and one with a red and a blue button. Fiddling with the controls, they tried hundred of combinations over a few hours, exhausting their collective brains and eventually getting the protective fields around the artifacts down. Inside they found a ${"content":"Purple Dagger Hilt","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ suspended above a pedestol as well as a ${"content":"Red Ring","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and a ${"content":"Blue Ring","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ orbiting it.

Collecting the items, they returned to the center and between ${"content":"Fly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Misty Step","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, managed their way out from the cave and back to the ${"content":"Guard Camp","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ through the ${"content":"Acid Rain","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, taking a long rest they prepared for the next day.

export.name: Dual Wielding
export.description:
You've learned to more fully leverage using multiple weapons while fighting, allowing you to gain the ${"content":"Dual Wielding","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ Feat should you choose to 

You must have a free ${Feat,darkorange}$ Point to add this under the ${"content":"Character","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ Page.

export.name: Fighter Styles of Combat
export.description:
Having used your accumulated experience to hone your skills as a ${"content":"Fighter","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, you have a decision to make on a fighting style to choose.

You have gained a ${Feat,orange}$ Point to choose one of the 3 Feats you now know:
+ Great Weapon Master
+ Two-Handed Fighting
+ Protection
+ Dueling
+ Defense
+ Archery

export.name: Travels: The Second Sulendiridan Tussel
export.description: With the party awake and as rested as can be, they took to investigating the area to find a way into the tomb. Looking around, a few flocks of sheep were in the area and the guards present seemed a bit sluggish in their patrols, though some seemed to be picking up or confused, likely due to a patrol group missing but not for very long. Devising a plan, ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ positioned themselves for a distraction as ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ used ${"content":"Major Image","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to make herself invisible while flying [ ${"content":"RetCon","class":"rs-red"}$: This consumed 2 Blue Power Crystals taken from Orla Jr and is actually not possible for Orla due to concentration limits, even with power crystals ] and ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ snuck around from behind to try to inspect the crates. As ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ reached the tomb, ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ used ${"content":"Call Lightning","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to wound and get the attention of the ${"content":"Kintari Elders","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, drawing the eyes of the guards from the area and to him. ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ ambushing the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ as they drew near. With the attack started however, some of the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ fled to the tomb, either to protect it or to seek shelter from the lightning, but this posed an issue to ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ as the elders that retreated inside were quite likely to see through her illusion. ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ reaching a similar problem while trying to reach the crates. However, both noted puzzles on the sides of two of the crates that seemed to funciton as locks. Making note o this for later and ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ rummaging through one of the crates, they then joined the fray. The fight was arduous and did not go as planned. While the party managed to kill the ${"content":"Kintari","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, struggling with an odd ${"content":"Crimson Banner","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ being held by one of them and the elders returning as some kind of undead abomination, a ${"content":"Kintarian Elder","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ using an odd incantation to wield multiple power crystals in some kind of orbital invocation circle around his arm, and the ${"content":"Great Wyrm","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ from before returning and catching the group as they tried to hide within the tomb's entrance. Scurrying to finish their goals, ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ opened the tomb and checked the throne to find that the ${"content":"Blade of the Mist","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was gone. ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ yelling back up to the others trying to frantically open one of the crates helped solve one of the locks, revealing a ${"content":"Giant Ornate Golden Hammer","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Grabbing it and starting to run down into the tomb, she found a few questions for the current plan as the ${"content":"Great Wyrm","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ threw several ${"content":"Fireballs","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ toward her, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, scattering some of the crates and knocking ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ unconscious. Nigh death, ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ healed ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and managed to stabilze ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, grabbing the small gnome and carrying her as they all took to the new plan of running south and jumping into the water. ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managing to grab the Wyrm's attention as she took off first, her new found hammer seeming to something it was trying to stop her from stealing. But her rogue like speed helped her stay ahead of it, taking off the cliff but not before the edge of a ${"content":"Fireball","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ caught her, throwing her wildly through the air. She managed to regain consciousness after a few seconds dead floating on the water and cackled maniacally as she waited for everyone else. The rest of her party made it to the cliff, but the open field made iut easy for the Wyrm to attack, ${"content":"Fireballs","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ catching ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, hurling ${"content":"Torrin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ unconsciously into the water. Healing their sinking cleric, the group called back to the boat so that they could be picked up, but with several days ahead of them of attempting to tread water, they sought out their rowboat to at least get afloat. Throwing on his ${"content":"Boots of the Water","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ headed out to grab ${"content":"Norwind's Folly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and get back to the group. Once he was back, exhausted from being awake and working so long, the group was nigh dead from struggling to tread, saved by the buoyancy of their stolen crate. Once everyone was in the rowboat, they headed out toward where the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was and met them off from the cliff. Back aboard the ${"content":"Sorafin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, everyone promptly passed out, their crew helping to keep them safe and watching over the boat. When they woke, they took some time to calm themselves, meditate on the ${"content":"Blessed Knowledge","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ they now possess and to attempt to open the crate they found with a particularly complex lock...

export.name: Arcane Power Crystal Orbital
export.description:
On ${"content":"318 Dormevum 5","class":"rs-lightblue"}$, you witnessed a ${"content":"Elder Kintari Priest","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ wield 4 Power Crystals in some kind of arcane power circle around his arm, seeming to greatly increase his power, though he seemed to have difficulty wielding it, the power was immense before the crystals disintegrated, seemingly from use.

They also seemed to expire individually, different magic taxing different crystals.

export.name: Tracking the Di Khien
export.description: You have managed to track the location of the Di Khien

export.name: Alchemy: Minor Healing Potion
export.description:
You know how to create a ${"content":"Minor Potion of Healing","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

Takes the below ingredients with an Alchemy Kit skill check at DC${10,orange}$:
+ 1 ${"content":"Flask","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ 1 ${"content":"Sana Leaf","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ 1 ${"content":"Alchemy Ingredient Bundle","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

These can also be brewed in a ${"content":"Cauldron","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. Takes the below ingredients with an Alchemy Kit skill check of at least DC${5,orange}$ and can brew multiple potions in one batch and takes several days:
+ 1 ${"content":"Sana Leaf","class":"rs-darkorange"}$
+ 3 ${"content":"Alchemy Ingredient Bundle","class":"rs-darkorange"}$

export.name: Spell: Identify
export.description: You've acquired the spell ${"content":"Identify","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

export.name: Travels: The Research Lab Accuio
export.description:
Taking a few days to recuperate from their arduous adventure on ${"content":"Sulendirida","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the group rested, identified the Heavy Warhammer ${"content":"Castupravus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, meditated on their ${"content":"Blessed Knowledge","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and managed to open the remaining crate, finding ${"content":"Duron's Blessing","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ inside.

Rested, they reviewed their predicament and attempted to triangulate the location of the ${"content":"Blade of the Mist","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s new found navigation skills and ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s ${"content":"Compass of Ambition","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. After a few days, they determined the artifact was likely somewhere in the middle of ${"content":"Sulendirida","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and the group concluded that the risk of powerful dragons likely meant it was protected, but either way, out of their capabilities. Reviewing their original plan, they decided to follow it while keeping the occassional eye on the lost blade. Their next destination, ${"content":"Racual","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ on the continent of ${"content":"Turrija","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ for some shopping to prepare for the predicted harsh cold weather of Southern ${"content":"Lurus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

On their way to the diplomatic city, they saw a strange phenomenon, and exceeding bright explosion that seemed to be quite far away. Their best guess was that it was somewhere out in the ${"content":"Sumaku","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ Sea, but were puzzled by it being seemingly fifth of the world away. There not being anythign of particular note out there to their knowledge, they continued on to ${"content":"Racual","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ a bit more on guard.

Their stop in ${"content":"Racual","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ was short, but fruitful for various trade goods, and most notably ${"content":"Heavy Coats","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ with which to bundle up for the cold weather, offering as much insulation as can be afforded by clothing alone. Taking a moment to stop by the local castle, they spoke to a local politico named ${"content":"Inare Kuris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and learned more of the fate of ${"content":"Qua Silverborn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$; That his entourage had been attacked, and, despite the additional guards the envoy received thanks to their warning, he was still over taken but had at least managed to make a run for it and was believed to be somewhere in Northern ${"content":"Lunderipio","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, hiding from the assassins. They also learned that he apparently knew something that would help mend the hostilities between ${"content":"Leoterra","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Nautrengo","class":"rs-darkorange"}$. The hope was that the ${"content":"Memory Wizards","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ of ${"content":"Indium","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ would be able to impartially confirm what had been found.

After some discussion over ${"content":"Qua Silverborn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s fate, the group decided to leave his rescue to the regiments that had already been dispatched and started toward the research lab that ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ dug from his memory on the northern tip of ${"content":"Vatnunda","class":"rs-darkorange"}$.

The trip to the lab was peaceful, but shortly before reaching ${"content":"Vatnunda","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, some triangulating seemed to indicate that the blade seemed to be on the move, heading westward on ${"content":"Sulendirida","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, but still on the continent. Due to the distance, it may simply be calculation error, but it still seems to be on the continent at least. And as a last minute treat, ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to brew 3 ${"content":"Minor Healing Potion","class":"rs-darkorange"}$s.

Rowing out to the seemingly pleasant small beach island, ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ took a moment to play the ${"content":"Arcana Tuned Mandolin","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, giving everyone +10 ${Athletics,orange}$ for 4 hours after their long rest, some gymnastic shenanigans following as they explored the tropical coasts. The only places of note in the area that ${"content":"Norwind","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ suspected were 2 caves, each with a large carnivorous plant inside.

With some divine assistance they decided on the left, and with ${"content":"Orla Jr. Jr.","class":"rs-darkorange"}$'s help, her flying through the cave and avoiding the plant, they found there was a yellow barrier at the end of the cave. Pondering for a moment on how to deal with the plant, they decided to careful prune the plant and slowly work their way to the back of the cave. And while they accomplished the task with ease, it toko quite some time, their athletic bonuses fading, though having helped with the task.

Confronted with the barrier, it seemed to encompass a great drop, ${"content":"Orla Jr. Jr.","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ helping once more by exploring the towering shaft and not finding a floor. After some discussion, ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ decided to explore herself, using ${"content":"Fly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to decend into the depths, and after going through 2 full casts she let herself plummet, using ${"content":"Feather Fall","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ once ${"content":"Orla Jr. Jr.","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ found the ground a few moments ahead of her.

On landing, she found a small laboratory and 3 rooms that seemed to have odd pedestals in their centers. Exploring further, she managed to find and somewhat repair a small lift in the the center where she landed and used it to retrieve everyone else and bring them down.

While in the lab, they poked around and managed to retrieve a ${"content":"Arcanic Channeling Staff","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ after ${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ pressed a ${"content":"Power Crystal","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ to one of the displays and additionally noticed that the panel seemed to rest after they all left the room. The final action to finding the staff seeming to be pressing a crystal to a display in the laboratory room and letting it consume the power crystal in question, which has thus far been red power crystals.

Working through the other rooms, they found the lab's interfaces in the remaining rooms somewhat confusing. The right room seemed to prompt for some kind of arcane energy trigger whenever a power crystal was placed against its sole floating glass pane, a faint feeling of needing to apply the energy to continue with some process. The left room had several floating glass panels that required the far middle pane to have a crystal pressed to it before any other panes would respond. But after trying all the colors to the main pane and then trying Red, Green, and Blue in various combinations on the three inner panels and the adjacent 120<sup>o</sup> panes, they seemed no closer to understanding than before, except now an alarm seemed to be sounding. With several red crystals consumed and only having 2 left, the group decided to call it a day and found themselves confronted by some kind of security system when they tried to leave.

${"content":"Torinn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to suppress the security system's defenses with ${"content":"Dispell Magic","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, and ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ managed to restore power to the lift by channeling a Red and Green power crystal into the system, consuming both in the process. With only 1 Red crystal left, the group packed up and left, lowering the lift back into place and hoping that whatever was inside was safely protected for them to come retrieve later when they had more power crystals with which to use below.

Continuing their journey, they made for the southern tip of ${"content":"Lurus","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and with some skillful sailing, managed to make it to the coast without being seen. Using ${"content":"Norwind's Folly","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Summit of the Sea","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, they rowed up the river west of ${"content":"Breid","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and stowed them in a small seaside cove before having ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ climb the wall with her ${"content":"Climber's Kit","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and setup rope for everyone.

${"content":"Natty","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ carrying everyone up the rope, they quickly set off to explore the area, keeping an eye out for wandering patrols or training Orcs and found the cold weather here to be excessively harsh, several suffering minor cold damage despite the heavy coats. But they continued on without any magical means of warmth or fire so as not to be easily discovered. But the hard cold and exploring on foot did let ${"content":"Xylaris","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ find a few herbs.

Venturing deeper inland and following a trail, the group made their way toward a canyon entrance that seemed to be in the distance and after a few hundred studs found that they didn't seem to be getting any closer. Walking for a bit more, the area seemed to become enveloped in a thick mist, the group tying themselves together with rope so as not to lose one another.

Sending ${"content":"Orla Jr. Jr.","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ up to survey from above, the mist did seem to stop somewhere in the clouds, but she wasn't able to see anything except the sky and clouds from above. Bringing that information back to ${"content":"Orla","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, the group prepared to explore the this new area....

export.name: Memory Wizards of Indium
export.description:
${"content":"Indium","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ is widely considered the magical nexus of the world and one such piece of that encompasses a guild of ${"content":"Wizards","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ whose specialty is memory recollection.

They've become an important part of political trials, but the empires avoid using them too much for fear of corruption.

You have however learned that in the case of the war between ${"content":"Leoterra","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ and ${"content":"Nautregno","class":"rs-darkorange"}$, one named ${"content":"Qua Silverborn","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ acquired a memory that the empires sought to confirm in the hopes that it may bring an end to the war.

export.name: The City Vefsioni
export.description: A secret city on the edges of the land mass in the mist of Reykurax, this is where those of evil intent come to do business in secret.
export.note: + vefsíðunni, dwarvish for Portal

export.name: Giant Whirlpool in the Samaku Sea
export.description: You know of a giant whirlpool ~10 miles in diameter in the Samaku sea but you don't know how it came to exist.
export.note: Occurred on Dormevum 15, 318

export.name: Spell: Comfy Hammock
export.description:
Targeting a space between 2 poles, you summon a magical mesh hammock.

While in the hammock, you may sleep protected from undesired disturbances. When cast, choose any number of creatures that may interact with you while in the hammock. Other creatures are not able to interact with you while you are in the hammock, though you do appear present.

Once you leave the hammock, you may choose to dismiss it.

If someone else sleeps in your hammock, they must pass a ${"content":"Wisdom","class":"rs-darkorange"}$ save against your spell DC or remain in the hammock longer, revealing in its comfiness.

Additionally, if someone else sleeps in your hammock, they are subject to the creatures chosen by you, and do not get to decide on their own.

export.name: Spell: Thought Shield
export.description: You weave a clouding veil over the mind of one creature you touch. For the duration, the target’s mind can’t be read or detected, creatures can’t telepathically communicate with the target unless the target allows it.

export.name: Spell: Mental Barrier
export.description: You protect your mind with a wall of looping, repetitive thought. Until the start of your next turn, you have advantage on ${Intelligence,orange}$, ${Wisdom,orange}$, and ${Charisma,orange}$ saving throws.

export.name: Spell: Commune
export.description:
